channel.title: Error Help
channel.description:
kay here is my error: client.java:12364: ' ; ' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " Has muted "+suggestion+"..."); ^
Whats wrong with this code? [code]if(command.startsWith("mutenow") && (playerRights >= 1)) { BufferedWriter bw = null; String suggestion = command.substring(8); PlayerHandler.kickNick = suggestion; sendMessage("Player"+suggestion+"Muted"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " Has muted "+suggestion+"..."); appendToMuted(suggestion); }[/code]

item.title: Error Help
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

Is all i need is help.
not crap from you two.

Read full topic

It was a joke, Dmitri Mendeleev.

item.title: Error Help
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

[quote=“Zombiedevice, post:11, topic:188188”][quote author=Reforced link=topic=250843.msg2101822#msg2101822 date=1205207365]

[code]if(command.startsWith(“mutenow”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {

 BufferedWriter bw = null;

String suggestion = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = anal;
sendMessage(“Player”+anal+“Muted”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " Has bumsecksed “+anal+”…");
appendToBumsecks(anal);
}[/code]

Everyone should for sure use this method of mute.
[/quote]

LMFAO ^…

Any ways, the solution to your command is:
Just take off the message to all lol, no one cares who you mute ^.^[/quote]
yeah, tried that. When you do that i get 9 extra errors along with that. So easy is it?

Read full topic
